activities: Database design in mysql, mysql database administration and mysql database development.

Development of an Angular LMS web application designed to teach rural communities virtually. Main page of lms where courses are shown, classification according to the user's interest. Course search engine according to name. User login and user registration. User menu according to roles. Administration of students, courses, topics, content, exams, videos, forums and tasks. Course description, course content and page to register as a user.

Development of a Flutter LMS mobile application developed to be able to teach virtually to rural communities. Main page of lms where courses are shown, classification according to the user's interest. Course search engine according to name. User login and user registration. User menu according to roles. Course description, course content and page to register as a user.
